scripts.build: babel --presets=env src/scripts/main.js > src/scripts/tmp.js && node src/scripts/lib/r.js -o src/scripts/build.js && rm src/scripts/tmp.js
scripts.output: cp src/scripts/require.js dist/scripts/require.js && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -r src/css dist/css && cp -r src/img dist/img
scripts.build-public-site: npm run build && npm run output
